defaultValue.description: The value of the menu that should be open when initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control the value state.

modelValue.description: The controlled value of the menu to open. Should be used in conjunction with onValueChange.

dir.description: The reading direction. If omitted, inherits globally from{' '} DirectionProvider or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

loop.description: When true, keyboard navigation will loop from last item to first, and vice versa.

as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
